p: Samples were prepared by adding heated aqueous phase (75 °C) to the heated oil phase (70 °C) ( Table 1) on thermostatic heating plate of magnetic stirrer IKA-MAG (IKA Werke, Staufen, Germany). Propeller rotary laboratory stirrer RW16 basic (IKA Werke, Germany) was used for stirring. At the temperature of 40 °C herbal active substances-wild bilberry leaves extract and wild bilberry seed oil were added into the cream (designated as WB), and the stirring was continued until the preparation had cooled. The placebo cream (sample P) sample did not contain wild bilberry oil or extract.
